summary: Reasons why Harry sucked at learning Occlumency
title: Reasons why Harry sucked at learning Occlumency
body:
Obvious

  1.  Snape’s lousy teaching methods
  2.  Piece of Voldemort’s soul very extremely close to Harry’s brain
  3. Harry’s lousy study habits

My headcanon

  1. Teaching Occlumency to children and teenagers is really not recommended because their mind is still not matured enough to take it. Teenage mind especially goes through so many changes and shifts during puberty that adding a difficult mind arts on top of that is insane

blog.name: justshoveabezoar
blog.title: HP
blog.description: Just needed an outlet for my Harry Potter thoughts

tags: respect to the fanfic writers out there
like England’s magical culture dates around 1000 years
when others have been at it for thousands
summary: Here’s something most fanfics have done better than jkr
body:
Here’s something most fanfics have done better than jkr

Building the American magical community around the Native culture. And going there is so obvious!

They actually believed in magic, in opposition to the Europeans who colonised the continent. Erasing the culture of the natives, and the Africans who were brought there and then villified for their magic (see vodou and houdou) in America, and somehow we get an America in the Potter World that is just some continuation of England, as if the history of Magic in America started in Salem.


Also something so damn obvious: statute of secrecy in America started with the Europeans landing on their shores. Like that’s Historical Muggles chasing wizards, for not having their beliefs.


Like i love Harry Potter, but there’s a LOT of erasure of the History of Magic around the world, and i’m tired of the whole “Europe is the center of the world” shtick. Which is also written much better in fanfics (might be cause the writers are from all over the world, and they tend to insert some of their own culture into the HP world, and i love it).


Rant over. Needed to get some ideas out of my head.

blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.name: drarryspecificrecs
blog.title: Obsession
blog.description:
This blog is dedicated to Drarry fics and their illustrations ♥
fic themes | fic fests | 2019 | 2018 | 2017 | 2016 | 2015 | 2014 | 2013 | 2012 | 2011 | 2010 | 2009 | 2008 | 2007 | 2006 | 2005 | 2004

body:
Top 10 longest fics posted on AO3 this month

1. Say My Name by Thunderbird587 [E, 199k]

Harry witnesses something unexpected in the 8th year boys’ showers and starts to see Draco Malfoy in a whole new light. The question is now, what is he going to do about it?

2. To the Memory of Love by @shelvesuponshelves [G, 55k]

in which Harry wakes up from a coma in a muggle world at 18, but with all the memories of Voldemort and the war.

3. Take the Air by @dysonrules [T, 51k]

Someone or something is attacking Muggles and leaving them for dead. Auror Harry Potter is assigned to the case, but with his usual partner unavailable, he is stuck with the most annoying Auror ever to walk the halls of the Ministry.

4. The Lost Malfoy by @istiz [M, 49k]

Draco is adrift after the war, but he’s not the only Malfoy who’s lost.

5. Silver Dragon by hazel_lannister [E, 46k]

What happens during sixth year when instead of merely stalking Harry notices some stuff is going down with Malfoy, and a tentative friendship slowly turns to something more, even on the dawn of war?

6. In The Red by @bixgirl1 [E, 45k]

When Harry goes looking for a vampire at a Creature club, the second-to-last thing Harry expects is to find Malfoy working there. The last thing he expects is to fall in love with him.

7. I Will Never Leave You by @justdrarryme [E, 40k]

Harry is still up to his stalking ways. But something’s different now. He’s still noticing Malfoy, but in a very different way than before. Things take a turn after they get paired up to make Amortentia one day during Potions class.

8. Sweet Solutions by Craftybadger1234 [M, 35k]

Draco is ‘out’ and an outcast. Harry is ‘in’ and confused and utterly failing at friendship. This is less a story about coming out, and more about trying to be friends in a post-war world.

9. heavyweight by @forestgreenlesbian [E, 28k]

Draco had moved out of his childhood home five days after his father got sent to Azkaban. He’d packed up his rooms, piling up boxes until the walls were bare and his cupboards were empty and his arms were shaking because he’d done it all by hand instead of using magic. He’d barely used magic at all since his trial. Then he’d left everything there in the middle of his bedroom and apparated away with one case of clothes that his mother shrunk down enough to fit in his pocket.  

10. Augury Forecast by @xx-thedarklord-xx [E, 22k]

Draco had always known that teaching at Hogwarts would be an experience, he just didn’t think that meant a flash flood in the kitchens, a windstorm in the Great Hall, or a sandstorm in the Quidditch pitch. Months of extreme weather would grate on anyone’s nerves, but to have Potter, the ever annoying Divination Professor, around every corner was even worse. So much for a quiet life at Hogwarts. 
★ HP Drizzle Fest 2018

10+. A Mile In Your Shoes by Chaz_1789 [E, 22k]

[…] “What in Merlin’s name have you done?!”
“I didn’t do this! I mean, I didn’t know– it was the… Shit. We need to find Hermione.”
“You know, Potter, I think it goes to show how royally you’ve cocked up that I’m going to agree with that statement.”

※ Fics from recent Big Bang are listed elsewhere.
✔ other months

tags: is there a name for this meme I can tag it under
summary: James Griphook Filius Thror Thrain Gimli Dwalin Balin Kili Fili Dori Nori Ori Oin Gloin Bifur Bofur Bombur Thorin Potter, you...
body: James Griphook Filius Thror Thrain Gimli Dwalin Balin Kili Fili Dori Nori Ori Oin Gloin Bifur Bofur Bombur Thorin Potter, you were named after all the dwarves and goblins i ever knew. my father was also part goblin so you’ve got some of that

summary: The problem is not that it's racist, it's far from that. The problem is that JK Rowling keeps adding random things to the...
body:
The problem is not that it’s racist, it’s far from that. The problem is that JK Rowling keeps adding random things to the established world of Harry Potter just for shock value.

Just my two cents. Please stop hating on the actress; she did nothing wrong.

reblog.comment:

blog.description: This is mostly where I post my daily sketches for /r/SketchDaily, with the occasional GW2 screenshot. I'm trying to improve my digital art and drawing in general. I love fantasy, Star Wars, Sailor Moon, Game of Thrones, and more!
